hero.label: Training
hero.title: Build Your Team's Improvement Capability
hero.description: Practical, hands-on training that develops real skills. Your team learns by solving real problems in your organization.

whenCertification.label: When Certification Makes Sense
whenCertification.title: Training That Creates Real Value
whenCertification.description: Certification is only valuable when it leads to actual improvement. Here's when our programs make sense:
scenarios: You're launching a formal improvement program and need skilled practitioners
Your team needs a common language and methodology for problem-solving
You want to develop internal capability to reduce reliance on consultants
Career development is important to your retention strategy

delivery.label: How We Deliver
delivery.title: Learning by Doing
delivery.description: Our training is different. Instead of weeks in a classroom, we combine focused instruction with immediate application.

approach.title: Real Projects
approach.description: Participants work on actual improvement projects in your organization, not hypothetical case studies.

approach.title: Coaching Support
approach.description: Between sessions, participants get coaching to help them apply what they're learning.

approach.title: Practical Tools
approach.description: Every technique we teach has been proven in real organizations. Theory without application isn't helpful.

approach.title: Flexible Format
approach.description: In-person, virtual, or hybrid delivery. We adapt to how your team works best.

items.title: Lean Lego Simulation
items.description: Problem-solving skills for team members who participate in improvement projects. Learn structured approaches to identifying root causes and testing solutions.

items.title: Lean Practitioner
items.description: Foundation-level training for anyone involved in improvement work. Learn to see waste, understand flow, and contribute to problem-solving.

items.title: Lean Six Sigma
items.description: Project leadership skills for those who will lead improvement initiatives. Learn to scope projects, manage teams, and sustain results.

cta.title: Build your improvement capability
cta.description: Let's discuss which training program would best serve your team's development.
